page.title: 06TADCASTER EAST C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: The school was opened in April 1977 There are 8 classrooms and a hall, which is used for assembly,P.E. and dinners.The dinners are cooked on the premises. We attend school every day except for Saturday and Sunday.School starts at 0900 and finishes at 1545 for the juniors and 1515 for the infants.We have a lunch break of 75 mins.and a playtime in the morning of 20 mins.and one in the afternoon of 15 mins. We begin with registration followed by assembly. Sometime during the day we do some mathematics,writing reading and topic work .At the end of the day Mr.Gibson reads a book to us.Then it is home time so we change our shoes,put our chairs on the desks, to make cleaning easier for the care-taker,and go home.
